name: wlimeq2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))

stmt.origin: mpan(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c2))
stmt.pretty: mpan(c0 = c1, WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1), c2 = c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c2 = c2 ∧ c0 = c1)→ WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c2 = c2 ∧ c0 = c1)→ WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 → WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1))
⊣ ((c2 = c2 ∧ c0 = c1)→ WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))
body.pretty: ⊢ ((c2 = c2 ∧ c0 = c1)→ WLim(c2, c0)= WLim(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cwlim(c2, c0), cwlim(c2, c1)))

comment: Equality theorem for the limit class. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jun-2018.)
